enhanced_description: Talview offers an award-winning, Gen AI-powered Talent Measurement Platform designed to seamlessly orchestrate talent workflows across screening, digital interviews, psychometric assessments, and remote proctoring. This single, AI-powered platform provides a 360-degree view of talent potential, enabling organizations to make quick, confident, and bias-free decisions for hiring and exam delivery, promoting equal opportunity. Trusted by recruiters and education services leaders in over 120 countries, Talview helps humanize and democratize large-scale hiring and credentialing processes by facilitating smoother live video interviews with features like face and voice authentication and coding editors, offering an extensive library of over 2,000 job-specific skill assessments, and providing highly scalable AI-driven remote proctoring options (Automated, Live, or Record & Review) to safeguard exam integrity.
